actions.name: Ice Face
actions.description: Effect: The user starts battle in Ice Face Forme and the first Physical-Category Attack that hits the user fails to hit. Then the user changes to Noice Face forme. If Snowy Weather is active and the user is in Noice Face forme, the user can change to Ice Face forme using a Simple Action.
